EmailTemplate.name: Data CleanUp Job Scheduler
EmailTemplate.subject: Data CleanUp Job Scheduler
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Data Cleanup Job Completed
Hello #SchedulerName,
The record deletion is Completed.
Status: #Status Number Of TotalJobItems: #TotalJobItems Number Of JobItemsProcessed: #JobItemsProcessed Number Of NumberOfErrors: #NumberOfErrors Reason of Failure: #failure
Best Regards, Salesforce Admin
